message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my original price was carefully considered based on the true value of this product. How about we meet halfway and settle at $875,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.
